name: Ni Liv
description:
Cats becoming ghosts after death: that explains how they can have nine lives.

This is my very first Game Jam, and my very first Godot project (started a week ago). Also, I am rather a musician/programmer than an graphical artist.

Enjoy!

Commands:

Arrow keys for movement
X for Running
F for Action (take possession of another cat)
R for game Reset

How to play:

Collect fishes, they will give you score, therefore lives (but no more than 9)
You have to press the Red button (I guess, I'm colorblind) and open the door located into the level map.
When you die, you control the ghost, that will let you take control of other cats.
Only when you are a cat, you can properly finish the level.
